title: Edgar Allan Poe's The Oval Portrait (1972) GOTHIC HORROR

sources.title: Edgar Allan Poe's The Oval Portrait (1972) GOTHIC HORROR
sources.description:
Story by: Edgar Allan Poe
Stars: Wanda Hendrix, Barry Coe, Gisele MacKenzie
Director: Rogelio A. Gonz√°lez

In this Gothic Horror, a woman finds herself possessed by the soul of another woman trapped inside a painting! 

TRIVIA: "One Minute Before Death" has often been confused as being an alternate title for "The Oval Portrait." Although they were made by the same crew, featured most of the same actors, and were both based on Poe, they are in fact two entirely different movies that were filmed at the same time. A
